feed.title: Azure Architecture Center
feed.subtitle: Updated articles for Azure Architecture Center

entry.title: Windows 365 Azure network connection
entry.summary: Learn how Windows 365 delivers highly optimized and personalized computing instances that are purpose built for each user's requirements.

entry.title: Automotive connected fleets
entry.summary: Learn how the connected fleets reference architecture helps you build solutions to manage connected fleets, generate insights, and integrate fleet solutions.

entry.title: Microsoft Entra security for AWS
entry.summary: Learn how Microsoft Entra ID can help secure and protect Amazon Web Services (AWS) identity management and account access. Discover Microsoft security solutions.

entry.title: Baseline architecture for an AKS cluster
entry.summary: Reference architecture for a baseline infrastructure that deploys an Azure Kubernetes Service (AKS) cluster.

entry.title: Azure VMware Solution networking
entry.summary: Get started with Azure VMware Solution foundation block networking. Understand what networking solution options exist and how to choose between them.

entry.title: Extend mainframes to digital channels by using standards-based REST APIs
entry.summary: Learn how the digital transformation architecture extends mainframe applications to Azure without disruptions or modifications to the existing applications.

entry.title: Multitenancy and Azure OpenAI
entry.summary: Learn how to deploy the Azure OpenAI models and work with the features associated with each model when you have a multitenant system.

entry.title: Analyze call center recordings using text analytics for health and Azure OpenAI Service
entry.summary: Automate the transcription of healthcare-specific audio data and the process of serving that data to end users.

entry.title: Hybrid Cross-Cluster Scaling with Azure Arc for the workloads deployed on Azure Stack HCI
entry.summary: Perform cross-cluster scaling of on-premises workloads by using Azure Arc, Traffic Manager, or Front Door and then deploy by using Azure Pipelines.

entry.title: Azure Spring Apps baseline architecture
entry.summary: Learn how to deploy Azure Spring Apps instances in multiple zones for increased availability, resilience, and performance.

entry.title: Integrate on-premises AD domains with Microsoft Entra ID
entry.summary: Learn how to implement a secure hybrid network architecture that integrates on-premises Active Directory domains with Microsoft Entra ID.

entry.title: Kubernetes monitoring and logging
entry.summary: Understand monitoring and logging for an Azure Kubernetes Service (AKS) cluster and workloads, and compare Amazon EKS and AKS monitoring and logging.

entry.title: Multitenancy and Application Insights
entry.summary: Learn about tenancy models that you can use with Application Insights and features that are useful when you use this service in multitenant systems.

entry.title: Azure Health Data Services architecture guide
entry.summary: Deploy Azure Health Data Services on Azure to improve your ability to safeguard your organization's health data.

entry.title: Mission-critical baseline with App Service
entry.summary: Learn how to deploy mission-critical web applications by using the Web Apps feature of Azure App Service.

entry.title: Microsoft SaaS stories
entry.summary: Collection of insightful interviews featuring Microsoft partners who have embarked on their unique software as a service (SaaS) journey.

entry.title: Deploy Azure landing zones
entry.summary: Learn about the deployment options for platform and application landing zones in Azure.

entry.title: HA enterprise deployment using ASE
entry.summary: Recommended architecture for deploying an enterprise application using App Services Environment in multiple availability zones.

entry.title: Magento e-commerce platform in Azure Kubernetes Service
entry.summary: Deploy the Magento e-commerce platform to Azure Kubernetes Service (AKS), and learn about considerations for hosting Magento on Azure.

entry.title: Considerations for multitenant control planes
entry.summary: Learn about the responsibilities of control planes in multitenant solutions and how to design a control plane that meets your needs.

entry.title: Build solutions with availability zones
entry.summary: Learn about the Azure availability zones construct, a software and networking solution for high availability (HA) that protects against datacenter failures.

entry.title: Ingest and store medical data in Azure
entry.summary: Create a data store to search and filter medical data by using Azure Data Factory pipelines with preingestion and postingestion validation pipelines.

entry.title: Prevent IPv4 exhaustion in Azure
entry.summary: Minimize private address space consumption when you build large networks in Azure. This article presents two methods to create more IPv4 address space.

entry.title: Reliable web app pattern for Java - Apply the pattern
entry.summary: Apply the reliable web app pattern for Java to your web app. Find essential implementation guidance for web apps moving to the cloud. Learn how to update (re-platform) web apps to be successful in the cloud.

entry.title: Reliable web app pattern for Java - Plan the implementation
entry.summary: Plan the implementation of the reliable web app pattern for Java. Find essential design guidance for web apps moving to the cloud. Learn how to update (re-platform) web apps to be successful in the cloud.

entry.title: Reliable web app pattern
entry.summary: Learn about the reliable web app pattern.

entry.title: Azure Kubernetes Service (AKS) considerations for multitenancy
entry.summary: This article describes the features of Azure Kubernetes Service (AKS) that are useful when working with multitenanted systems. It links to guidance and examples for how to use AKS in a multitenant solution.

entry.title: Deploy AD DS in an Azure virtual network
entry.summary: Learn how to extend an on-premises Active Directory domain to Azure in order to provide distributed authentication services.

entry.title: Azure DNS Private Resolver
entry.summary: Use Azure DNS Private Resolver to simplify hybrid recursive domain name system (DNS) resolution for on-premises and Azure workloads.

entry.title: Resiliency checklist for services
entry.summary: Resiliency is the ability to recover from failures and continue to function. Use this checklist to review the resiliency considerations for Azure services.

entry.title: Make all things redundant
entry.summary: Use these recommendations to avoid having single points of failure, by building redundancy into your application.

entry.title: Failure mode analysis
entry.summary: Get information about doing a failure mode analysis (FMA) for cloud solutions that are based on Azure.

entry.title: Citizen AI with Power Platform
entry.summary: Learn how to use Azure Machine Learning and Microsoft Power Platform to quickly create a machine learning proof of concept and a production version.

entry.title: Cyber threat intelligence in Microsoft Sentinel
entry.summary: Import threat indicators, view logs, and create rules to generate security alerts and incidents, and visualize threat intelligence data with Microsoft Sentinel.

entry.title: Choose an Azure data service
entry.summary: Use this guide to decide which data service best suits your application.

entry.title: Azure Sandbox
entry.summary: Accelerate your Azure project with a fully functional sandbox environment that includes virtual networks, virtual machines, and databases.

entry.title: Microsoft SaaS stories
entry.summary: Collection of insightful interviews featuring Microsoft partners who have embarked on their unique software as a service (SaaS) journey.

entry.title: Azure Database for PostgreSQL considerations for multitenancy
entry.summary: This article describes the features of Azure Database for PostgreSQL that are useful when working with multitenanted systems, and it provides links to guidance and examples.

entry.title: Multi-region load balancing
entry.summary: Learn how to build an Azure system that serves web and non-web workloads with resilient multi-tier applications in multiple Azure regions.
